item.description:
Where: on the PHONE
( Depending on your calling plan,
you may have to pay for the long distance call )

** Phone # & handout info will be sent to you
after you RSVP : YES"

Meeting Description:
"Chime in" from 9 - 10 pm on the phone ...

- with your questions
- to get support and suggestions
- to share your LOA experiences

Suzy Spivey, presenter at February's meetup, is on the call too. Suzy is here to answer any questions & to help members on their journey to embrace their true purpose.

When the dreams we pursue in life are guided by our purpose, our vibrational escrow is magnified and we enter a state of “flow”. From this state, magic happens and dreams manifest!

Thank you very much, Suzy, for being available for our members this evening.

To review details of February 10th Meetup agenda:
http://lawofattractio...

***********************************************************
About Suzy Spivey:

Suzy Spivey brings passion, belief, and a wide range of life experience to her work as a Certified Dream Coach™, TV Host and Producer, and Inspirational Speaker. Trained by Marcia Wieder, America’s Dream Coach and founder of Dream University, Suzy uses the Dream Coach™ Program, a proven 10-step process to guide professionals who are stuck, at a crossroads, or seeking more meaning in their lives, in identifying, believing in, and taking inspired action on their dreams. Suzy completed her training in life coaching through the Coaches Training Institute (CTI).

After 23 years in corporate positions and 15 years of searching for “the answer”, Suzy is now pursuing her dreams and living on purpose. One of her dreams has been launched with the production of a local access TV show, Daring to Dream™, sharing the hope, inspiration, and practical advice of people who have pursued their dreams and changed their lives. She is also working on a documentary focusing on Women Daring to Dream. Suzy raises her vibration through dance, teaching a movement process that taps into your bliss.

For more information or to schedule a complimentary consultation, visit www.suzyspivey.com or email suzy@suzyspivey.com.

group.name: The Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: BostonLOA TELE-Meetup: LOA Mastermind with Suzy Spivey
